info.name: [SH17A] game of life - 226chars
info.description: further golfing of [url] https://www.shadertoy.com/view/ls2fDz [/url] using new possibilities ( #define + buffer-wrap)

renderpass.code:
/**/  // 170 by coyote 

#define T texture(iChannel0, 1./iResolution.xy

#define mainImage(O,U)                       \
    O = 3. + T*U) ;                          \
    for (int i=0; i<9; )                     \
        O -= T*( U + vec2(i%3,i++/3)-1. ));  \
    O = vec4( O*O==T*U)*O || iFrame < 1 && tan(U.x*U.y) > 0. )

/**/
        
        

/**   // 181 chars

#define T(a) texture(iChannel0, (a)/iResolution.xy )

#define mainImage(O,U)                   \
    vec4 C = T(U);                       \
    O = -3.-C;                           \
    for (int i=0; i<9; i++)              \
        O += T( U + vec2(i%3,i/3)-1. );  \
    O = vec4( O*O==-C*O || iFrame < 1 && tan(U.x*U.y) > 0. )

/**/
renderpass.name: Buf A
